title: Barn Door with Smoke
marks: Signature and Date LRC on mount below image, in pencil: [Minor White]
description: spatula on latch on weathered wooden door with frayed rope pull; milkweed seeds on door latch; white foggy element (smoke) extending down from handle of spatula to bottom of image (double exposure?)
